channel.title: So, I made my house in l4d2 Auth tools.
channel.description:
Was bored. So i made my house in sdk, I might even make it into a survival map.
Pictures: [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/741929/myhousel4d2/cm_house0001.jpg[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/741929/myhousel4d2/cm_house0002.jpg[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/741929/myhousel4d2/cm_house0003.jpg[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/741929/myhousel4d2/cm_house0004.jpg[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/741929/myhousel4d2/cm_house0005.jpg[/img]
^_^
I like Constructive Cristisism, however, the ammount of detail in the maps, is what my house is.. I dont have any picture frames, I dont own much, so Basically what I have is there.

item.title: So, I made my house in l4d2 Auth tools.

item.description:
The download link doesn’t really work for me

Read full topic

item.title: So, I made my house in l4d2 Auth tools.
item.dc:creator: Maxx_Skywalker
item.description:
Doesn’t that defeat the purpose of creating a map of your house? lolz Well I guess so.

You know, looking at the custom maps people have been creating for the L4D games (and TF2) makes me wish that I could play more than just the 360 versions. Oh well. You do what you gotta do to be able to play Valve’s new games.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: flugelhorny
item.description:
There are two reasons why I wouldn’t do that with my house.
Number one is I’m not able to.
Number two is it would scare the hell out of me and I would have to move.

item.title: So, I made my house in l4d2 Auth tools.
item.dc:creator: Mabilis
item.description:
Same, I want l4d2. :rabies: I have never had L4D1 or 2. My dad has L4D2 and plays on it a lot - when im sleeping I hear a chainsaw and screaming of a girl going: HELLP ME!!! repeatedly.

I mainly want l4d2 cus it would be awesome to map for, then get my dad to play the maps I make.

item.title: So, I made my house in l4d2 Auth tools.
item.dc:creator: Duck
item.description:
I have posted the Download link

Duck:

https://www.moddb.com/mods/left-4-dead-2-house-holdoff-survival-map

changed allot from the previous Screenies, like the skybox, made it darker etc etc. overall better.

i.e

also, thanks everyone for the support, I probably wouldnt of made it into a map without it. thanks

EDIT: Got a message from https://www.strategyinformer.com/? they want to Host my map on their site/servers, awesome!

Read full topic
